text:
Primity Bio | San Francisco Bay Area | Frontend or Full-Stack | Onsite or Remote

We're building a high-speed, cloud-based bioinformatics data analysis application and seeking engineers to join our team. (No experience in biology needed.)

Ideally you have a passion for and experience with building highly interactive, creative interfaces (e.g. buisness intelligence or dashboarding apps, products like Google Docs). Our stack includes Vue, Node.js and C++. Opportunities to contribute to open-source projects.

zbjornson at primitybio . com
